content: अनुष्ठित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Done, performed, accomplished &c.; practised, followed, &c.; संबंधाः सदनुष्ठिताः <ls>Ku. 6. 29</ls> brought about; तथानुष्ठिते that being done, thereupon; begun, undertaken; न युक्तं हि त्यक्तुं कार्यमनुष्ठितं <ls>Rām.</ls>; (used actively) following, practising; <ls>Ms. 10. 127.</ls>
